name: FREE Gradient Notion Covers Pack
description: Gradient Notion Cover is the perfect template to make your Notion workspace stand out with style! This digital template combines a minimalist design with a beautiful gradient color scheme to create a stunning canvas for your notes, lists, and other daily planning tools. The gradient colors give this template a professional yet stylish look, making it the perfect addition to any workspace. Whether you're a student or a professional, a creative or simply looking for some spice in your Notion works
